                                              <div data-reactid="302">
                                                <div data-reactid="303">
                                                  Great Mountain &amp; Park Views  Palm Springs 5 room, 3/bd, 2/b open concept, fireplace, great room, vaulted ceilings, updated kitchen, granite, ss, travertine master bath w/ double shower and skylight. Walk-in closet, 3 patios, 4 person spa and carport.
                                                </div>
                                                <div data-reactid="304">
                                                  5 room, 3 bedroom, 2 bath, 4 person spa, indoor fireplace, High volume vaulted ceilings, that has a re-designed floor plan to accommodate todays lifestyle with a touch of retro.  Garage is unavailable.
                                                </div>
                                                <div data-reactid="305">
                                                  South Palm Springs is great as it typically is not as windy as some parts of town and is very convenient and the park and views of the San Jacinto Mountains and the  Santa Rosa's along with a killer view of the iconic Bob Hope House in South-ridge.
                                                </div>
                                                <div data-reactid="306">
                                                  <li data-reactid="307">
                                                    <p data-reactid="308">
                                                      We had a great stay. Clean house located across the street from a nice large park. 10 minute drive to downtown, 5 min to airport. Pictures and photos are accurate, Luke provides everything you need. Good place to book if you are in the area. 
                                                    </p>
                                                    <span data-reactid="309">
                                                      Sam 
                                                    </span>

                                                  <li data-reactid="311">
                                                    <p data-reactid="312">
                                                      The house worked well for us with everything we needed including lots of space to spread out. It was clean and very comfortable.  We especially enjoyed using the patio - a lovely, quiet and relaxing spot. It even has hummingbirds. The location is convenient to downtown Palm Springs, though the house is across street from a city park and occasionally busy traffic.

                                                    <p data-reactid="320">
                                                      An amazing property.  Perfect for the six of us and Luke was a very attentive host. Would definitely recommend this property!

                                                      Kevin
                                                    </span>

                                                    </span>
                                                  </li>
                                                  <li data-reactid="323">
                                                    <p data-reactid="324">
                                                      We stayed in Palm Springs for five nights during the new year. We had a wonderful time here in Luke's big house which is as pretty as the pictures show on Airbnb. The house is on the opposite of a big and nice park and within 5 to 10 minutes drive to almost everything in the city. Luke has been very responsive the moment I contacted him on Airbnb. Upon our arrival, he had been waiting for us in the house. When we asked for additional kettle and rice cooker, he provided us brand new ones immediately. I really appreciate all he did during our stay. Thank you very much.
                                                    </p>
                                                    <span data-reactid="325">
                                                      Cynthia
                                                    </span>

                                                  <li data-reactid="327">
                                                    <p data-reactid="328">
                                                      Staying with Luke at his Palm Springs home was an excellent experience. He was extremely easy to get in contact with, accommodating, and the house is much more beautiful than the pictures even let on. I would highly recommend staying at Luke's place if you are in the area... It is only a few miles from downtown and has beautiful views of the mountains. Thank you Luke- we will definitely be back! 
                                                    </p>
                                                    <span data-reactid="329">
                                                      Charlotte
                                                    </span>
                                                    <span data-reactid="330">

                                                    </span>

                                                  <li data-reactid="331">
                                                    <p data-reactid="332">
                                                      The furnishing and decor of Luke's home is quite beautiful. We were on a working vacation so we didn't have time to enjoy all of the amenities, but it was wonderful to come home to a lovely appointed home with all of the conveniences at you fingertip. I especially enjoyed the master bedroom bath, large enough for two with wonderful waterfall shower heads. Luke was especially helpful; able to answer all of our questions and easy to contact. I would recommend Luke's home to anyone and would definitely go back. 
                                                    </p>
                                                    <span data-reactid="333">
                                                      Santelia
                                                    </span>
                                                    <span data-reactid="334">
                                                      2017-03-22T00:00:00Z
                                                    </span>
                                                  </li>
                                                  <li data-reactid="335">
                                                    <p data-reactid="336">
                                                      The property is exactly as the pictures show it. It's big and bright and very clean. Note that the hot tub is bit of a squeeze for 4 adults. You definitely have to be comfortable with one another! The main bedroom is great at night, it's dark and quiet because it's facing the back yard. However, be aware that the front two rooms face the street and the property is right at a stop sign. So if you are a light sleeper, be sure to bring earplugs. I also suggested to Luke that he adds some room darkening curtains, because it is quite bright in the morning with only a white blind. We had a car, so getting around wasn't a problem. In the evenings, we used Uber to get to downtown (~$10 each way). If you don't have a car, I know there were buses going by, but I'm not sure of the convenience, cost, or schedule of them. We had a great time, and everything was pretty much as we expected. Luke was responsive and accommodating.
                                                    </p>

                                                <div data-reactid="445">
                                                  UPGRADED! Current SAVE$ rates are for ROOM ONLY. Breakfast available. Contact host for SPECIALS!  Everything in the Palm Springs area is easy by car, taxi, bus.  Plenty of onsite parking. Pamper yourself at the spas, or catch some rays by the pool! Seasonal pool, but available all year round.  Pool can be heated between Sept 15 - Apr 15 with supplement to cover costs.
                                                </div>
                                                <div data-reactid="446">
                                                  Tastefully upgraded to delight you! Sink into your Euro Pillow Top bed, soothed by Egyptian cotton sheets for your ultimate sleep comfort. Luxury toiletries to invigorate your mind and body followed by a Euro continental breakfast starts each new day.

PLEASE NOTE: This smaller queen room (bathroom opposite, across hall) is ideal for a solo traveler, business traveler or a couple spending a break away, but is not recommended for stays of over 5 days.

Please also see my two other room listings "Oasis" - large CA King poolside suite, ideal for a more luxurious breakaway or vacations and extended stays. "Retreat" - larger queen en suite is ideal for a solo traveler, business traveler or a couple spending a break away or vacation, but not an extended stay of 21 days plus.

PLEASE NOTE - Minimum stay is 2 nights, apart from holidays/special events which are minimum stay of 3 - 4 nights.

                                                <div data-reactid="585">
                                                  Coachella, Stagecoach, The Strip in Palm Springs, Rancho Mirage Dining, &amp; Golf, Golf, Golf - All within walking distance or a short Uber away. Super private &amp; quiet 2 bed, 2 bath on the golf course awaits your getaway needs. Flexible everything
                                                </div>
                                                <!-- react-text: 586 -->                                                <!-- /react-text -->                                                <!-- react-text: 587 -->                                                <!-- /react-text -->                                                <div data-reactid="588">
                                                  <li data-reactid="589">
                                                    <p data-reactid="590">
                                                      We had a great time in this cute Palm Springs condo. The beds and couches were comfortable and the rooms were nicely decorated with good amenities. (Loved all of the tv's and the HBO in the living room!). It was very hot and there was an issue with the a/c not working one night and part of the day.  The host had even come over before we arrived to turn on the a/c but they must not have noticed that it wasn't blowing much air and it definitely wasn't cold air. It made it pretty hard to sleep the first night in the place. Once we alerted the host of the issue, they were responsive and had it serviced as soon as possible.   The pool was fun and it was pretty quiet in the neighborhood (and the whole town) as we were there in the heat of the summer over July 4th weekend.  The BBQ grill was nice and worked pretty well, (though it needed to be cleaned off from cobwebs). It was a tad temperamental to start the grill but you just have to be patient. I look forward to coming back for another weekend getaway in the future. Thanks!
                                                    </p>
                                                    <span data-reactid="591">
                                                      Jason
                                                    </span>
                                                    <span data-reactid="592">
                                                      2016-07-04T00:00:00Z
                                                    </span>
                                                  </li>
                                                  <li data-reactid="593">
                                                    <p data-reactid="594">
                                                      The hosts for this location were great, extremely accommodating and very nice people.   They were very flexible with check in and check out -- which other hosts in the area were not -- so that was definitely a huge plus.  The location was clean and is accurately represented in the pictures.  The hosts also came to the house early to turn on the AC for us so it wasn't  burning hot when we came in.  Overall a great experience, highly recommend!
                                                    </p>
                                                    <span data-reactid="595">
                                                      Stephanie
                                                    </span>
                                                    <span data-reactid="596">
                                                      2016-06-13T00:00:00Z
                                                    </span>
                                                  </li>

                                                <div data-reactid="811">
                                                  Welcome to Palm Springs! My place is a very beautiful, peaceful condo where you will feel cozy from the first moment you arrive. The place has everything you need. The kitchen is fully equipped. The community is very calm and clean. There are 2 swimming pools with spas. Walking distance from groceries and the Buzz that will takes you to the city center and other attractions for free.  The views are incredible from any window of the condo. You can see the mountains change their colors.

                                                    <p data-reactid="824">
                                                      My wife and son stayed in Palm Springs recently to attend the desert trip concert (fabulous!) in nearby Indio and rented Angelica's place for three days.    The place is wonderful, in a low density secured compound with covered parking and a great private pool. The location is very central and close to many great restaurants and shops.    The apartment is very spacious, impeccably clean ,decorated with taste with all the appliances and very efficient and  quiet air condition system.    Two bedrooms each with bathrooms and very comfortable beds.    Angelica is  a super nice person also, very responsive for responding to queries and check in.     We will definitely be back in PS where Angelica's  place has significantly contributed to a great experience!    PS During the desert trip concert that attracted  a total of 150.000 spectators over two consecutive weekends all hotels and many private renters have hugely raised their prices (even sadly many Airbnb hosts rejecting bookings at published rates in contradiction to the policy ).Not Angelica who kept them as usual and did not try to rip guests!

The apartment was very clean and had all the essentials to make our stay comfortable. Angelica was a great host and available if we needed her.

                                            <div class="listingDescription_1woxt0o" data-reactid="1035">
                                              <div data-reactid="1036">
                                                <div data-reactid="1037">
                                                  One level unit, w/ 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, walk-in showers and a modern kitchen. Roomy inside, the development is also open and spacious, with beautifully landscape and lush, manicured lawns. This is Palm Springs at its best, with mature citrus trees, 8 swimming pools and a hot tub, tennis and pickle ball courts and a community barbecue area with natural gas grills.
                                                </div>
                                                <div data-reactid="1038">
                                                  There is a walking/bicycle path across from the development. Information about local dog parks, dog friendly restaurant and dog friendly hiking trail is available. Within a mile and half radius, you can walk or bike ride to Trader Joe’s, Target, Vons, Lowe’s, Bed Bath &amp; Beyond, Starbucks, Rubio’s, Walmart and other establishments. Downtown is 5 miles away, so by car, you are only 10 minutes from movie theaters, casinos and fine dining.

The building itself is a triplex inside and near the back of a secure gated community near Tahquitz Creek Golf Resort. The unit a quiet retreat with only two neighbors, a place for rest and relaxation. It is all one level, with a walk in closet, walk-in-showers with grab bars and ADA toilets. The garage is used for storage, including two bicycles and new washer and dryer.

Bedding for home is as follows:
Master Bedroom: California King
Guest Bedroom: Queen
Hide-a-Bed: Double
                                                </div>
                                                <div data-reactid="1039">
                                                  This is a really special place - with lots of space in the development between groups of buildings.  It's relaxing and quiet.
                                                </div>
                                                <div data-reactid="1040">
                                                  <li data-reactid="1041">
                                                    <p data-reactid="1042">
                                                      My husband and I (and are puppy) enjoyed our week long stay at Elizabeth's condo.  The condo is single story unit located in a quiet gated complex where we didn't hear the neighbors even once during our stay.  The location is great for exploring both the Palm Springs and Palm Dessert area.    The kitchen is fully stocked and includes a dishwasher.  The unit itself is quite spacious and could comfortably fit a family of 4 to 6.  The kitchen and bathroom were newly renovated with upscale features.  I particularly like the rain shower and the new fluffy towels.  Our doggie loved the doggie toys and treat.    The pools and tennis courts were rarely in use, so it felt like we had the complex to ourself.      Elizabeth was flexible on the check in/out times.  
                                                    </p>
                                                    <span data-reactid="1043">
                                                      Sonia
                                                    </span>
                                                    <span data-reactid="1044">
                                                      2016-11-26T00:00:00Z
                                                    </span>
                                                  </li>
                                                  <li data-reactid="1045">
                                                    <p data-reactid="1046">
                                                      This place was Great in a nice gated residential neighborhood.  It was very clean and had plenty of towells and the kitchen had everything needed to cook a meal.  Looked like the kitchen and bathroom were brand new as was the flooring.  Very close to everything.  
                                                    </p>

                                                  Architectural mid-century  gem with two master bedrooms and en-suite bathrooms and a third bedroom.
Beautifully renovated in 2015, spacious  and furnished with iconic mid-century furniture.
Patio and private deck, steps from  heated pool.
                                                </div>
                                                <div data-reactid="1149">
                                                  Mid-century  gem offering 1700 sqft of living space with large patio and private deck, natural light and airy
Entirely remodeled in 2015, furnished with iconic mid-century designer  furniture (Eames, Knoll, Jacobsen, Nelson,....) 
Open  floor plan with a wood fireplace in the living room, fully equipped gourmet kitchen, a 48' SONY Smart TV, wireless blue tooth Geneva sound system.
A large master bedroom with  wood fireplace,  king size bed, lounge area and walking closet with en-suite bathroom with floating sinks.
A  second master bedroom, queen size bed and walking closet with en-suite bathroom with floating sink
A third bedroom/office with a sleeper sofa and a large closet.
Steps from heated  pool, mountain views from the deck.
The patio has a grill, the deck is equipped with a cool misting system.
                                                </div>
                                                <div data-reactid="1150">
                                                  South Palm Springs, golf courses and the Parker Hotel close by, less than 5 minutes from downtown.
                                                </div>
                                                <div data-reactid="1151">
                                                  <li data-reactid="1152">
                                                    <p data-reactid="1153">
                                                      Loved Isabelle's place!! Mid-century design, spacious, light-filled apartment with wonderful kitchen located just below Bob Hope's former home. Wonderful hiking opportunities nearby as well as great dining. 
                                                    </p>
                                                    <span data-reactid="1154">
                                                      sue
                                                    </span>

                                                    </span>
                                                  </li>
                                                  <li data-reactid="1156">
                                                    <p data-reactid="1157">
                                                      Beautiful space, very nicely decorated, bright, clean, open.  Wonderful kitchen with very large assortment of cooking tools, glasses, dishware and appliances.  High end neighborhood, just down the street from famous bob hope and steve mcqueen houses, with hiking directly from the apartment.  great views from the pool/hot tub area. Some limited view of Palm Springs and mountains from patio and living room window.  Nice elevation. Overall, great experience.  Sleeps 2 couples very comfortably. 
                                                    </p>
                                                    <span data-reactid="1158">
                                                      Mark
                                                    </span>
                                                    <span data-reactid="1159">
                                                      2016-02-08T00:00:00Z
                                                    </span>
                                                  </li>
                                                  <li data-reactid="1160">
                                                    <p data-reactid="1161">
                                                      Stayed one week in Palm Springs and found this location to be the ideal starting point for all of the great attractions the area has to offer. The house in bungalow style is part of a development which crawls up on a hillside. It can be easily reached from one of the main roads leading through Palm Springs. Communication with Isabelle and her manager on site, Todd, was fast and efficient and all assistance needed was offered. The house itself is clean and tidy with a very well equipped kitchen where it was fun to prepare meals. Only thing to consider is that the house is on a hillside and from the parking lot there are several flights of stairs leading down to the house. It is not easily accessible for someone with a major walking or climbing-of-stairs handicap. The development has also a well maintained ommunal pool area and is pleasant and quiet. We will like to return sometime and where very happy with our stay at the residence. 
                                                    </p>

                                  <div class="spacing_501y9d-o_O-evenSpacing_1h2mx7z" data-reactid="1266">
                                    <div itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/ListItem" data-reactid="1267">
                                      <meta itemprop="name" content="LIVE MORE! Brand new designer remodel - retro vibe - House - Palm Springs" data-reactid="1268"/>
                                      <meta itemprop="position" content="9" data-reactid="1269"/>
                                      <meta itemprop="url" content="www.airbnb.com/rooms/15531392?checkin=2017-05-01&amp;checkout=2017-05-30&amp;location=71613" data-reactid="1270"/>
                                      <div class="listingCardWrapper_9kg52c" data-reactid="1271">
                                        <div id="listing-15531392" class="listingContainer_f21qs6" data-reactid="1272">
                                          <div aria-hidden="true" class="imageContainer_1xligvk-o_O-imageContainer_seo_y9ev9r" data-reactid="1273">
                                            <div class="wishlistHeartContainer_1ibcqbg" data-reactid="1274">
                                              <label for="wishlist-listing15531392" class="container_1figzu9" style="height:32px;width:32px;" data-reactid="1275">
                                                <input type="checkbox" id="wishlist-listing15531392" class="input_1m8bb6v-o_O-fastclickHack_1dwq0yf" data-reactid="1276" value="on"/>

                                                  <svg viewbox="0 0 32 32" style="height:32px;width:32px;display:block;" fill="#484848" fill-opacity="0.5" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" data-reactid="1280">

                                            <div class="listingDescription_1woxt0o" data-reactid="1282">
                                              <div data-reactid="1283">
                                                <div data-reactid="1284">
                                                  Located in the quiet and architecturally significant neighborhood of Sunmor, this freshly remodeled home has some of the best wrap-around mountain views in all of Palm Springs. The large yard with brand new pool and spa have mountain views from every angle. Crisp white walls, Jonathan Adler furnishings, custom draperies and pillows, and glossy 24 x 24 floor tiles all work together seamlessly to create the most beautiful backdrop that will make your vacation memorable for years to come!
                                                </div>
                                                <div data-reactid="1285">
                                                  LIVE MORE! is located in the neighborhood with the highest concentration of Alexander and other architecturally significant mid-century modern homes built between 1955 and 1961. This neighborhood has been remarkably preserved and restored home-by-home over the past 10+ years and now is one of the sought after communities in the city. The home has 3 bedrooms, 2 baths, and a double seating area living space with an open floor plan kitchen. This house is as easy for a couple to enjoy as a group of 6. Every room in the house has mountain views and access to the yard via large sliding doors. The walled and gated yard provides endless hours of pool side fun, multiple seating areas, and complete privacy.

The pool yard has some of the most unobstructed wrap-around mountain views available in Palm Springs. The 14’ x 28’ pool is 6’ deep and has all day long sun exposure since it’s pushed out away from the house and shade. The 6 person 7’ x 7’ spa sits above the pool with spillover waterfalls to the pool and great views of the house and San Jacinto mountains.

Living room 1, directly off the kitchen, has a sectional corner sofa and a 50” SHARP flatscreen with built in Netflix, Sling, HBO NOW, and amazon prime video apps (you need your own accounts) – as well as Time Warner Cable. There is a retro style Victrola record player with a stack of 33’s – but if you would rather play your own music you can bring your own cd’s or hook up any smart phone or tablet via bluetooth or with the auxiliary input. There are also a stack of different playing cards, books, and board games.

Living room 2, with access to the pool, has a tuxedo style tufted bottom grey sofa, two club chairs, custom draperies and pillows, and floor lamps – perfect for mingling, enjoying a martini, or staring out at the sparkling pool and spa.

The dining room has a stunning white lacquer Jonathan Adler dining table that seats 6-8 people comfortably,  a white lacquer buffet , a fully stocked bar serving cart (just bring your own alcohol) and groovy shag style artwork and light fixtures along with custom draperies. 

The kitchen has brand new stainless Frigidaire Gallery appliances, solid surface white counter tops, and white lacquer cabinetry. Everything you could need to prepare and serve a great meal is here and waiting for you. There is also a breakfast bar on the outside of the kitchen extended island with 2 barstools – perfect for keeping the cook company, or working on your laptop should you need to.

The oversized master bedroom has a queen bed, a 50” SHARP flatscreen with built in Netflix, sling, HBO NOW, and amazon prime video apps – as well as Time Warner Cable. This bedroom has large en suite bathroom with dual sinks and a large walk in shower stall with 10” rain shower head and clerestory window that allows for palm tree views and tons of natural light. This bedroom also has a walk in closet flooded with natural light through the round porthole window with Southern exposure.

Guest bedroom 1 has a full bed and wall to wall mirrored closet doors. This room has a 40” Samsung flatscreen with Time Warner Cable and sliding door access to the pool yard.

Guest bedroom 2 has two standard twin beds and wall to wall mirrored closet doors. This room has a  “32” Insignia flatscreen tv with Time Warner Cable and sliding door access to the pool yard.

The guest bathroom at the end of the hall – shared by the two guest bedrooms – has a wide double sink vanity and a large step in shower with a clear frameless glass enclosure.

TOT - 3106
                                                </div>
                                                <div data-reactid="1286">
                                                  This house is located in central Palm Springs in the highly desirable and architecturally significant neighborhood of Sunmor.  It is a long but manageable walk to downtown, or a quick drive of less than 5 minutes.
                                                </div>

                                            <div class="listingDescription_1woxt0o" data-reactid="1416">
                                              <div data-reactid="1417">
                                                <div data-reactid="1418">
                                                  Just Listed April 2017!

Relax at this 3 bed &amp; 3 bath old Palm Springs flavored condo now available at Lakes Country Club in Palm Springs. While the unit itself is average, the surrounding amenities on site are very very high end; Golf, tennis, 15 pools and spas with one located right out front. 10 foot ceilings with glass sliders for the big open feeling.
                                                </div>
                                                <div data-reactid="1419">
                                                  Two car garage. Large master bath with walk in closets. The Lakes is a gated community with full time security along with an active clubhouse, pro shop and much more.

About our home:

Living Area: 2170
Accommodates: 6
Number of bedrooms: 3
Number of Bathrooms and Type: 3 full baths
Number of beds: 5
Master Bedroom - Floor Nr. / Type of Bed: 1 California Queen
Room 2 - Room Type / Floor Nr. / Bed Type: 2 twin beds
Room 3 - Room Type / Floor Nr. / Bed Type: day bed with a pull out trundle
Room 4 - Room Type / Floor Nr. / Bed Type: full bed ( This full bed is actually out on the sun porch but may not be ideal for extreme weather climates)


AMENITIES:
ENTERTAINMENT: 
Available in the property: TV, Satellite/Cable, DVD Player, Internet, Wireless Internet (Continuous access in the listing), Stereo, Books, Video Library
Total number of TVs: 2
Location of the TVs: Living Room, Master Bedroom

KITCHEN AND DINING: 
Available in the property: Refrigerator, Stove, Oven, Microwave, Dishwasher, Coffee Maker, Toaster, Dishes Utensils, Pantry Items
Dining area seats: 4
Is there a child's highchair available: No

UTILITIES: 
Available in the property: Central Heating, Central A/C, Washer, Dryer, Ceiling Fans
Location of Washer and Dryer: on Sun Porch
Location of ceiling fans: Master Bedroom, Guest Bedroom

PARKING:
Spots available: 3
Description of parking: Street parking only

**PALM SPRINGS HAS A 11.5% TOT / HOTEL TAX on the gross payment that we will send as a request to you following your initial booking and prior to your arrival. This amount will need to be paid in order to access the home.
                                                </div>
                                                <div data-reactid="1420">
                                                  There are so many great eateries and restaurants near us, and most are a ten minute bike ride away, or a five minute car ride. Try Cheeky's breakfast, or Sherman's for breakfast. Try Nina's if you're in the mood for Mediterranean, Tyler's for burgers and Shanghai Red's for the best fish tacos in town! All of these spots are less than five minutes away from our home.

                                            <div class="listingDescription_1woxt0o" data-reactid="1503">
                                              <div data-reactid="1504">
                                                <div data-reactid="1505">
                                                  Think "mini Hawaii in the Desert" nestled against the mountains behind the gates of the Oasis Resort, featuring Clubhouse, Fitness, Salt Water Pools/Spas. Complete designer-furnished condo with option of single or dual Master Suites is perfect for couples, relocation or Executive on the go!
Base Price is unit with ONE Master Suite Plus extra powder bath... to unlock 2nd Master, at least 3 persons must be indicated-system will price accordingly.
                                                </div>
                                                <div data-reactid="1506">
                                                  Behind gates and nestled against majestic mountains with waterfalls, fountains, lush tropical landscaping you'll find this Villa in the "Oasis Resort" true to its name!

Private ground-floor unit can be booked with 1 or 2 FULL MASTER SUITES., Extra Powder Bath, Living/Dining, Kitchen, Office nook w/Wi-Fi &amp; Printer. Beautifully designer-furnished with tile &amp; grassweave floors, granite, appliances, TV/CD/DVD, ceiling fans. 

Covered Lanai offers BBQ cooking, al fresco dining &amp; lounging on Teakwood furniture. Direct access/steps away to 8 pools/spas, tennis courts w/pro on-site, clubhouse. 

Living room has full-size sleeper sofa; entire unit can accommodate up to six person. Always fresh-pressed linens, towels and array of pillow comfort!

Desirable wind-protected area, SW facing mountain &amp; fountain views. Next door to 5-star Parker Hotel, golf courses, mountain &amp; bike trails. Minutes to shopping, downtown, casino, airport. On main bus line, walking distance to Vons/Trader Joes!

Book now for pure Paradise in the Desert!!
                                                </div>
                                                <div data-reactid="1507">
                                                  This is a full resort... there is a Clubhouse with numerous daily activities (ie fitness center, water aerobics, tennis lessons, Sunday Breakfast, etc) that you may take part in.  Also info and some discounts to local attractions. 8 pools/spas, some salt water or adults only.
                                                </div>
                                                <div data-reactid="1508">
                                                  <li data-reactid="1509">
                                                    <p data-reactid="1510">
                                                      Be sure to check if the ant problem has been taken care of &amp; that you are not locked out of part of the unit you just paid for. Bring bath towels &amp; washcloths for yourselves, and be prepared to thoroughly clean unit, unless the owners have learned to keep it cleaner from our review. Also, bed is wrapped in plastic, so you'll hear and feel that when you are in it. Also, very dusty/dirty.

                                            <div class="listingDescription_1woxt0o" data-reactid="1646">
                                              <div data-reactid="1647">
                                                <!-- react-text: 1648 -->                                                <!-- /react-text -->                                                <div data-reactid="1649">
                                                  Villa San Jacinto is a private single level luxury condominium centrally located within a gated compound in Palm Springs, California. Come relax and enjoy yourself in this spacious and well appointed condominium home. A Two bedroom, Two bath end villa with sweeping 360 degree mountain views. Close to Tennis Courts, Hot Tub and Swimming Pools.
Villa San Jacinto is the perfect combination for a comfortable, carefree and relaxing vacation in the desert. This villa is perfect in every detail. There are eight swimming pools. Four tennis courts. Twenty four hour security. Large hot tub spa. Putting green and recreation center. The villa has privacy like that of a single family residence. Surrounded by Golf courses, Park lands and Indian reservations. Expansive mountain views and over three hundred days of sun a year make this a real getaway for fun in the sun. Conveniently located in Palm Springs just five minutes from the international airport and major shopping. Downtown Palm Springs is less than ten minutes away.
Villa San Jacinto is adjacent to Tahquitz Creek Golf Resort and near Knott's Soak City water park
The villa is available to rent by the week or month.
Amenities include:
Cable TV, High Speed Internet WiFi. Blu-ray entertainment system. Flat screen TV's in Living room and both bedrooms.
Tiled Patio with lounge seating, dining table and gas bar-b-q
Large Living room and Dining room with ten foot high vaulted ceilings.
Well appointed gourmet Kitchen with new stainless appliances and Corian counter tops
Large bedrooms with comfortable pillow top beds.
Original Contemporary Art throughout.
Upgraded custom furnishings.
Washer, Dryer, iron and ironing board.
Sports equipment, Bikes, Tennis rackets, Golf putters etc.
Private covered parking and guest parking located right at the entry
Upgraded bed and bath linens.  
Villa San Jacinto is an Ideal destination for year round travelers of all ages.
 Come stay at our villa. You'll come back again and again!

Palm Springs Transient Occupancy Permit #4921
                                                </div>
                                                <!-- react-text: 1650 -->                                                <!-- /react-text -->                                                <div data-reactid="1651">
                                                  <li data-reactid="1652">
                                                    <p data-reactid="1653">
                                                      My family and I stayed at Mack's Palm Springs condo for a week. We loved every minute of being at his place and I enjoyed every time that Mack and I corresponded. As for the former, the condo is well-decorated with close attention paid to subtle yet important details like carefully installed track lighting and a beautifully decorated patio. The kitchen is equipped with everything one would need in order to make meals at home; my parents and I took full advantage of this. We spent the evenings on the patio where we ate all of our meals, drank wine, and played rounds of Uno in the evening (the Uno cards were one of several games that Mack had had on hand which served as a pleasant surprise). The Fairways as a gated community was perfect. The tennis courts are a mere stone's throw away from Mack's home. The pool--the largest in the community--was a close walk also. Neither the tennis courts nor the pool were crowded thereby making both places feel as if they were private. The bikes in the garage were a welcomed bonus. My boyfriend and I took advantage of the nearby bike trails, which were outside of the Fairways community. Moreover, the condo's location was perfect: our destinations were always ten minutes away by car.  In short, my family and I had an excellent time at Mack's place and corresponding with Mack was easy and effortless. A word to potential guests: if you're looking for an ideal setting for your next Palm Springs visit, look no further because you'll find such a place at Villa San Jacinto.
                                                    </p>
                                                    <span data-reactid="1654">
                                                      Alexandra
                                                    </span>
                                                    <span data-reactid="1655">
                                                      2014-04-12T00:00:00Z
                                                    </span>
                                                  </li>
                                                  <li data-reactid="1656">
                                                    <p data-reactid="1657">
                                                      This is a comfortable and well appointed 2 bedroom condo just 10 minutes from downtown Palm Springs. Because it is an end unit, it is quiet and it close to the tennis courts and swimming pool. Other condo owners were very friendly.  We'd like to book another stay in the near future.
                                                    </p>
                                                    <span data-reactid="1658">
                                                      Janet
                                                    </span>
                                                    <span data-reactid="1659">
                                                      2012-11-29T00:00:00Z
                                                    </span>
                                                  </li>
                                                  <li data-reactid="1660">
                                                    <p data-reactid="1661">
                                                      Simply a fantastic place to stay in every way!  We have stayed in dozens of hotels and rental home around the Palm Springs area over the past decade, and this place is THE best value we experienced to date.  We live in LA, so come out quite often and I kinda hate to share this gem.  However, Mack has more than earned the praise given his outstanding efforts to create a super comfortable, relaxing and tasteful retreat for all to enjoy.  The surrounding community is extremely friendly and peaceful.  The location of this particular condo is probably the most ideal in the entire complex. This is one-story end unit condo, with a vacant condo next-door, at the edge of the complex, so your backyard is very private and set up like an outdoor living space. Tennis courts next-door are not only convenient, but provide for an expansive panorama of the mountains. The kitchen is set up for gourmet cooking, including one of the best cookbooks ever produced in the US (the 2 volume Gourmet Cooking from Gourmet Magazine.)  Spices, pantry and fridge basics, even wine in the wine-rack next to the fridge!  Everything worked, nothing was missing, totally relaxing, the place was immaculate...I just really do hate to share it! So, it is totally fine if you do NOT stay here.  There are probably lots of other places in the desert that also need discovering, so I say you go for that instead - please!
                                                    </p>

He was prompt to respond to any questions we had prior to arriving and we even had a question while there he answered immediately.    The place was super secure, quiet and very pretty.    Thanks Mack for making our Desert Trip wonderful!

Absolutely stunning and spotless inside - and with a pool and tennis courts seconds from the door. Don't know if it was the time of year or not, but we had the pool to ourselves for most of the day - perfect for cooling off.  Would definitely return.

This friendly community also has a Gym, tennis courts &amp; just steps to the greens. Close to Target, Trader Joe's, Starbucks, Downtown Palm Springs and an easy drive to the Polo Grounds for Coachella Music Festival,and Stage Coach.

                                                <div data-reactid="2248">
                                                  Original owner. Quiet, meticulous ground level, 2 bdrm, 2 bath (1 tub, 1 stallshower), fully stocked condo. Wi-Fi, Time Warner cable, 2 big-screen TVs, ALL new towels, sheets, &amp; kitchen essentials.Steps away a pool heated @ 88 , jacuzzi @ 105, 6 tennis courts w nighttime playing.Little getaway in beautiful Palm Springs.
                                                </div>
                                                <div data-reactid="2249">
                                                  Original owner renting for the first time.
Fully furnished ground level 2bdrm., 2 bath secluded &amp; quiet Palm Springs condo, feet from the phase #5 pool.
Located w/I walking distance from the Palm Springs international airport this condo complex (La Palme)is meticulously maintained.
Tennis courts, heated pool (88) &amp; jacuzzi (103).
Master bedroom has a CA king bed, ceiling fan &amp; new 50" TV to enjoy. Bath tub , new toilet &amp; double vanity sinks.
Second bedroom has a Queen bed &amp; ceiling fan.Hall bath newly tiled stall shower w corner seat &amp; toilet.
Central a/c &amp; heat,wi-if, Time Warner cable &amp; landline.
All new flatware, dishes, glassware, pots &amp; pans, small kitchen appliances; coffee maker, toaster oven, toaster,electric tea kettle, etc.
Outdoor patio table w 4 chairs &amp; umbrella,, BBQ, pool toys.
Everything you need to relax, kick-back &amp; enjoy the sun , fun &amp; silence in Palm Springs
Covered carport parking
30 dy minimum rental, discount considered for multiple months.
No smoking, no pets, no children.
                                                </div>

Home of the
Amazing hiking, cycling minutes (website hidden) Aerial tramway if you need your snow-fix 12 mins away.Thursday night Street-faire, movie theatre, PS Desert Museum, etc.

The house itself is clean and tidy with a very well equipped kitchen where it was fun to prepare meals. Only thing to consider is that the house is on a hillside and from the parking lot there are several flights of stairs leading down to the house. It is not easily accessible for someone with a major walking or climbing-of-stairs handicap. The development has also a well maintained ommunal pool area and is pleasant and quiet. We will like to return sometime and where very happy with our stay at the residence. Once your account is canceled, future booked trips will be canceled.
